ygData.subject: Bravery
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Its been pretty quiet here lately so i ll see if i can get a thread going! Ok whats the bravest (or most stupid) thing that you have done? I ll start then:
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,
Its been pretty quiet here lately so i'll see if i can get a thread going!
 
Ok whats the bravest (or most stupid) thing that you have done?
 
I'll start then:
 
This will probably sound a bit lame to you veterans,  but as a newbi to EQ this was pretty scary (not to mention stupid!)
 
I got bored soloing round Qeynos hills with my lv6 Bard, my level 7 ranger has far more fun grouping round Greater Fay and CB so.....(in best forest gump voice) "i just started running" and tried to run (and boat) to kelethin.
 
Being a bard i can run pretty fast so the plains of karana were easy.  The gorge that leads to highpass was a lot scarier, running round those narrow ledges with a small train of griffon things behind! (oops, still bound in Qeynos!!!).  Highpass hold was just as bad - i must have run back out of the zone 8 or 9 times with a load of gnolls behind - anyway luckily a friendly Halfling guided me through - he was lv9 and we still only just made it!
 
Anyway my guide was going to Rivervale....and i have to be in work in the morning so i followed him there and finally got a bind before i camped.
 
tommorow......On to Freeport!
 
Ok so its not exactly soloing dragons on Velious - but it was the most nerve wracking thing ive done so far  - and there is still a long way to go to Kelethin!
 
 
Ok your turn!!
 
 
Cheers
Ralwen
6th Verse Bard - Torvonnilous
